PATIENT_RECORDS.DOB_NOT_SPECIFIED: Only a year of birth was specified during patient registration. This is an approximate date.
PATIENT_RECORDS.NOT_FOUND: Unable to find patient with that ID. Please check with your system administrator.
PATIENT_RECORDS.TITLE: Patients

CHECK_IN.TITLE: Check In
CHECK_IN.NOT_RECENT: This patient has not recently been checked in. Check the patient in to track this hospital visit.
CHECK_IN.ORIGINAL: This patient has never been checked in.

VISITS.TITLE: Patient Visits
VISITS.ORIGINAL: This patient has no logged visits.
VISITS.SEARCH_INFO: The input will search for diagnosis after 3 characters have been typed.
VISITS.NOTES_INFO: Principal complaint, time since previous visit, referring doctor, etc...

FINANCES.HAS_CREDITOR_BALANCE: The patient has a creditor (negative) balance of ({{ balance | currency:currency_id}}). It may be intentional, but may indicate a problem.
FINANCES.HAS_EXCESS_BALANCE: The patient has a debt of {{ balance | currency:currency_id}}. This is a large amount of debt and may present a problem recovering the debt.
FINANCES.HAS_OVERDUE_BALANCE: The patient has debt from {{date | date}}. Consider writing off the debt or following up with the patient.
FINANCES.NO_ACTIVITY: The patient doesn't have any activity!
FINANCES.NOT_IN_GOOD_STANDING: There are some irregularities in the financial activity.
